title: How to learn organic chemistry for the class 12 board exam - Quora

response.answer_text: Well i really didn't get your question. You Wana learn organic chemistry or understand organic chemistry?? If you wanna learn then it's simple,take out the notes keep on writing reaction close the book and try to write down again…it works If you wanna understand then buy a book on reaction mechanism and try to understand the mechanism of the given reaction and role played by reagents and catalyst. This way u will never forget the reaction and u will score great in competitive exams. All the best.

First off all write the initial and final products. Now think of various reactions that you have studied, if you are good at those reactions then they will click automatically. But if you are not good at them then put your organic notes in front of you and try to solve some conversions with it’s help. After some time you will be familiar with these things very easily.
